name: LoaderSim
description:
LoaderSim

LoaderSim is a simulation-based application targeting unloading and loading operations of heavy machinery equipment such as wheel and chain loaders, bulldozers, and so on. 

Brief info on the controls;

WASD and SPACE buttons for driving and braking.

2 - for lowering links.

3,4- opening &closing gripper/bucket.

5- raising links.

Stay tuned for more updates. Check the corresponding platform to use i.e Windows, Linux, and macOS.
